name: CF Fertilisers UK Limited
membership: UK - Chemicals Industries Association, Agricultural Industries Confederation
goal: Manufacture and supply of nitrogen fertiliser products (based on ammonium nitrate) and related industrial chemicals (ammonia, nitric acid, carbon dioxide and ammonium nitrate).
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Competition, Energy, Environment, Trade
euInitiatives:
Policies and regulatory issues affecting the nitrogen fertiliser sector, including agriculture, chemicals, environment, energy, climate change and trade policy areas.
Current priority areas are the EU (Greenhouse Gas) Emissions Trading System (Phase 4 from 2021-2030), Trade Defense with respect to ammonium nitrate fertilisers, new Fertilizer Regulation (replacing EC 2003/2003) and the Industrial Emissions Directive (proposals for and development of relevant Best Available Techniques Reference Documents).
